first_para: Simon Christopher Danczuk (born 24 October 1966) is a British Labour Party politician, who has been the Member of Parliament (MP) for Rochdale since 2010.

full.extract:
Simon Christopher Danczuk (born 24 October 1966) is a British Labour Party politician, who has been the Member of Parliament (MP) for Rochdale since 2010.
^ "Crown Office". London-gazette.co.uk. 13 May 2010. Retrieved 22 April 2014.
full.title: Simon Danczuk
